item.title: Home
item.description: At Clover, we design and build low-cost and highly functional Android-based POS systems for small and medium-sized businesses (SMB). Business owners (also called Clover merchants) use our suite of apps for different business functions. For third-party developers, Clover is an open platform for building apps and for integrating external POS systems with Clover devices. Reach over hundreds of thousands of merchants Clover is the fastest-growing point-of-sale (POS) platform backed by Fiserv, a market leader processing over 50% of global card transactions.
